about_the_game:
This is the original soundtrack (OST) of the game Brookhaven Grimoire, which was composed by Thales Guimaraes (@tacgmusic). It contains a total of 27 tracks that were custom-made, with a lot of love, for this amazing game.

All tracks presented here are compressed (.mp3), for the best and most personalized listening experience. I hope you enjoy!
